dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services to you.

items.usage: Usage data (how you interact with our services)
items.technical: Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information)

dataPurpose.title: How We Use Your Data
dataPurpose.description: We use your data for the following purposes:

items.service: To provide and maintain our services
items.improvement: To improve and personalize your experience
items.communication: To communicate with you about our services

dataRights.title: Your Data Rights
dataRights.description: Under GDPR and other applicable data protection laws, you have certain rights regarding your data:

items.access: Right to access your personal data
items.erasure: Right to request deletion of your data
items.portability: Right to receive your data in a portable format
items.withdraw: Right to withdraw consent at any time

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our service and hold certain information.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: Essential for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous information.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements.

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: Enable the website to remember your preferences and personalization settings.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy:

items.account: Account data is retained while your account is active
items.legal: Some data may be retained longer to comply with legal obligations
items.backup: Backup data is retained according to our backup rotation policy

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your data:

items.encryption: Data encryption in transit and at rest

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:
